title: Nice to meet you, I'm Mel.
text:
Nice to meet you, I'm Mel. 
  


   Here lies a website under construction, and the countless things that made me into who I am.



Get to know me

title: Everything I do
text:
Thank you for getting here…
I use this website to record everything in my life I’ve enjoyed, it is more of a personal journal rather than a public portfolio. However I enjoy sharing about myself and meeting strangers, so if you ever want to get to know me, go on ahead!
Below you will find a non exhaustive list of things I’ve experimented with and proud of. I pride myself for wanting to know a little bit about everything, and hopefully I will not stop updating this list. If you came from one of these hobbies, feel free to check out the other things I’m doing. This entire list is being continuously updated, and so is each of the blogs.










   
     
     
       Order By
       Default
         
          Title
        
         
          Date - Oldest
        
         
          Date - Newest

title: Art and Such
text: Yes, it is true that half of the stuffs on my website can be considered as art. However, this page is purely dedicated to my art pieces that does not have other purposes than solely existing. In other words, this is a log of all the digital and traditional paintings I’ve done.

title: Game Design
text:
Telling Time
I worked as the UI/UX designer for this one! That includes making the main menu, buttons, pause screen, etc.


SCARAB
Again! The UI/UX designer. I really loved the art our artist made for this game.

title: Everything, everywhere, all at once.
text:
This is a page I use for random questions I pretend one could be asking, then answer them in a passive agressive way.
If you are ever curious about the title of pages, it is my all time favorite movie, here is one of my favorite scene from it:

What’s the reference behind the website name?

Nothing really, Malfunction is a cool word so I made my name a part of it

Is Mel your real name?

No

Why don’t you use your real name?

Mel sounds cooler, also it makes it slightly more anonymous

But you have your real name and a picture of you in one of the projects…

I know

Did you draw the front page?

Yes

title: Chess
text:
As of 09/09/24. I have been trying to push my chess rating up to 2000 rapid. I am currerntly about 50 points away, that is, about 6 wins away.
I started playing chess when I was in elementary school. My parents brought me to the world of competitive chess because they believed I need a hobby! It is a little bit too much for the 9-year-old me, so I stopped playing after I gained this amazing thing named free will. That is, chess haven’t really crossed my mind during middle school and most of high school. However, as the worldwide pandemic took control of my social life, I slowly realized that the only online game I am good at – is chess. In reality, I started playing and enjoying chess around first year of college. Until now, I actively enjoy different chess variants, chess clubs, and getting to know people through chess.

title: Web Design
text: I’ve been interested in website and UI/UX design for the longest time. This website will be the one I use to test out new ideas, while getting a basic understanding of HTML and CSS. Funny thing, this website is actually built in R studio with quarto. That is, I am using a statistical software to build my first official portfolio. Before this, I’ve used WordPress and various other non-coder friendly tools for website design.

title: Everywhere I’ve been
text:
Still here?
This is a page I use to log my core memories in life. That includes my favorite locations, proud achievements, memories I’ve made with friends and such.
